availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Washington Hensley (Clark County, Kentucky, merchant tailor and soldier)

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, merchant tailor and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Nichols on March 4, 1858, in Clark County. Lawyer in Clark County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in 1850. Merchant tailor in Clark County in 1860. Enlisted as a private in the 8th Kentucky Cavalry (C.S.A.), Co. E, on September 10, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District 2, p. 2.
